attributes.action: Change the way live TV is advertised and the name.. Freeview is not free to view
attributes.additional_details: In advertisements for free view they push the point that it's free to watch without any subscription charges... Surely that's blatant false advertising when you need to pay well over £100 a year for a TV licence. How can it be called free view when it's far from free to view? So my petition is calling for a name change possibly but mainly to make any advertising clear on the actual cost of the TV licence and the need for one to watch free view.
attributes.background: Freeview is advertised as free to view but is only available to watch live with a paid TV licence. If advertised as free to view it should be free! Otherwise it should be made clear about the TV licence charges when advertised.

rejection.details: Complaints about advertising are the responsibility of the Advertising Standards Authority Ltd (ASA), not the Government or Parliament.
